post.desc:
Punishment for trying to steal from Remilia's [**collection of curiosities**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cabinet_of_curiosities).

Nazrin definitely, definitely has broken into Kо̄makan before. Hell, I think she's broken into everywhere. And since she keeps such a low profile, people conveniently blame Marisa.

But she is saying "Master" here, though... 😏 🐯
